segment.source: Troubleshoot Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection
segment.target: Troubleshoot Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection

segment.source: Find solutions and work arounds to known issues such as server errors when trying to access the service.
segment.target: Find solutions and work arounds to known issues such as server errors when trying to access the service.

segment.source: Troubleshoot Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection
segment.target: Troubleshoot Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection

segment.source: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later
segment.target: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later

segment.source: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)
segment.target: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)

segment.source: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.
segment.target: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.

segment.source: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]
segment.target: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]

segment.source: This section addresses issues that might arise as you use the Windows Defender Advanced Threat service.
segment.target: This section addresses issues that might arise as you use the Windows Defender Advanced Threat service.

segment.source: Server error - Access is denied due to invalid credentials
segment.target: Server error - Access is denied due to invalid credentials

segment.source: If you encounter a server error when trying to access the service, you’ll need to change your browser cookie settings.
segment.target: If you encounter a server error when trying to access the service, you’ll need to change your browser cookie settings.

segment.source: Configure your browser to allow cookies.
segment.target: Configure your browser to allow cookies.

segment.source: No data is shown on the portal
segment.target: No data is shown on the portal

segment.source: If no data is displayed on the Dashboard portal even if no errors were encountered in the portal logs or in the browser console, you'll need to whitelist the threat intelligence, data access, and detonation endpoints that also use this protocol.
segment.target: If no data is displayed on the Dashboard portal even if no errors were encountered in the portal logs or in the browser console, you'll need to whitelist the threat intelligence, data access, and detonation endpoints that also use this protocol.

segment.source: Depending on your region, add the following endpoints to the whitelist:
segment.target: Depending on your region, add the following endpoints to the whitelist:

segment.source: Windows Defender ATP service shows event or error logs in the Event Viewer
segment.target: Windows Defender ATP service shows event or error logs in the Event Viewer

segment.source: See the topic Review events and errors on endpoints with Event Viewer for a list of event IDs that are reported by the Windows Defender ATP service.
segment.target: See the topic Review events and errors on endpoints with Event Viewer for a list of event IDs that are reported by the Windows Defender ATP service.

segment.source: The topic also contains troubleshooting steps for event errors.
segment.target: The topic also contains troubleshooting steps for event errors.

segment.target: Troubleshoot Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection onboarding issues
